name: Rain Status
label: Rain Status
format: {{msg.payload ? 'RAINING' : 'DRY'}}

name: Main Valve Status
format: {{msg.payload ? 'WATERING ACTIVE' : 'WATERING OFF'}}

name: Remote Rain Status
format: {{msg.payload>10 ? 'RAINING' : 'DRY'}}

name: Remote Valve Status
format: {{msg.payload ==1 ? 'WATERING ACTIVE' : 'WATERING OFF'}}

name: Manual Valve Control
label: Manual Irrigation Override
tooltip: Toggle to manually control main farm irrigation

name: Remote Manual Valve Control
label: Manual Irrigation Override
tooltip: Toggle to manually control remote field irrigation

name: Main Soil Threshold
label: Main Farm Soil Moisture Threshold (%)
tooltip: Set the soil moisture level that triggers automatic watering

name: Remote Soil Threshold
label: Remote Field Soil Moisture Threshold (%)
tooltip: Set the soil moisture level that triggers automatic watering for remote field

name: System Mode
label: System Operation Mode
tooltip: Select automatic or manual operation mode

name: System Status
format:
AgroSense Smart Farm
Real-time Agricultural Monitoring System
Connection
{{msg.connection_status || 'Offline'}}
Signal: {{msg.signal_strength || 'Excellent'}}
Active Fields
{{msg.active_fields || '2 Fields'}}
All Systems OK
Irrigation
{{msg.irrigation_active ? 'Active' : 'Standby'}}
{{msg.irrigation_active ? "Water optimization active" : "System ready"}}
Real-Time Date and Time
{{msg.timestamp || 'Loading...'}}

name: Remote Field Status
format:
Remote Field Station

LoRa Connected - Field B

Signal Strength
{{msg.signal_strength || 'Strong'}}
Distance
{{msg.distance || '2.5 km'}}

name: Main Irrigation Logic
Remote Irrigation Logic
System Status Aggregator
Irrigation Decision Display
format:
{{msg.payload ? "IRRIGATION ACTIVE" : "IRRIGATION OFF"}}

Decision: {{msg.reason}}
Soil Level: {{msg.soil_moisture}}%
Threshold: {{msg.threshold}}%
Mode: {{msg.mode | uppercase}}
Last Update: {{msg.timestamp | date:'HH:mm:ss'}}

tooltip: Export historical sensor data to CSV
